text: Hamelia is a genus of flowering plants in the coffee family, Rubiaceae. The name honors French botanist Henri-Louis Duhamel du Monceau (1700–1782). ==Selected species== * Hamelia axillaris Sw. - Guayabo Negro * Hamelia cuprea Griseb. * Hamelia macrantha Little * Hamelia papillosa Urb. (Jamaica) * Hamelia patens Jacq. - Firebush (American tropics and subtropics) **Hamelia patens var. glabra Oerst. **Hamelia patens var. patens ==References== ==External links== Category:Rubiaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hamelia
